title: Safe and healthy shelter for every family- Jana Sevana housing project launched
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix By: Nalin Hewapathirana) “The aim of the government is not to evict poor people from shanties, but to allow them the right to live in decent houses in a more appropriate environment. The slum dwellers should not be slum dwellers forever. These people are denied basic facilities throughout…
